meanings.sent1: That yutz always forgets his keys.
meanings.sent2: Don't be a yutz and double-check your work.
meanings.sent3: The yutz thought he could fly by flapping his arms.
meanings.sent4: She felt like a yutz after spilling her drink on the boss.
meanings.sent5: The yutz's antics at the party made everyone laugh.

meanings.definition: To behave in a foolish or stupid manner.
meanings.sent1: Stop yutzing around and focus on your studies.
meanings.sent2: He tends to yutz when he's nervous.
meanings.sent3: She yutzed her way through the obstacle course, tripping over every hurdle.
meanings.sent4: The team yutzed their chances of winning by not practicing enough.
meanings.sent5: Don't yutz with the fragile equipment; you might break it.
